containers.name: engine-image-ei-db6c2b6f
args: diff /usr/local/bin/longhorn /data/longhorn > /dev/null 2>&1; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then cp -p /usr/local/bin/longhorn /data/ && echo installed; fi && trap 'rm /data/longhorn* && echo cleaned up' EXIT && sleep infinity

command: test $(nc -zv localhost 8500 > /dev/null 2>&1 && nc -zv localhost 8501 > /dev/null 2>&1 && nc -zv localhost 8502 > /dev/null 2>&1 && nc -zv localhost 8503 > /dev/null 2>&1; echo $?) -eq 0

initContainers.name: wait-longhorn-manager
command: while [ $(curl -m 1 -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://longhorn-backend:9500/v1) != "200" ]; do echo waiting; sleep 2; done

containers.name: pre-pull-share-manager-image
command: echo share-manager image pulled && sleep infinity
